response.overview: In the heat of a summer afternoon deliciously hunky Eddie Diaz looks over at the gorgeous tattooed body of stud Damian Rios while they sunbathe. One thing leads to another and the two of them have some hot and heavy hardcore action in a beautiful outdoor setting.  Colby Keller and Tyler Johnson just can't seem to concentrate on their studies being so close to each others' beautiful muscular bodies. A little study break can't hurt, right?  And when Brent Diggs and Xander Scott are tossing the ball around, there's something erotic in the air that makes them forget all about the football part of "touch football." Can you believe there was ever a time when Xander didn't know how good a blowjob from a dude could be? Brent is his first... And speaking of firsts, the bonus section has the first ever appearance of Eddie Diaz on Randy Blue.
response.title: Inner Desire
